---
title: "03_augment"
format: html
---

```{r}
ri_expression_data |> 
  pivot_longer(cols = -X,
               names_to = "sample",
               values_to = "expression") |> 
  inner_join(ri_metadata, by = c("sample" = "GC.code" )) |> 
  filter(Exp == "RI_batch_WC") |> 
  select(X,expression,sample) |> 
  pivot_wider(names_from = sample,
              values_from = expression) |> 
  write_csv("../data/03_expression_augment_data.csv")
```

```{r}
ri_annotation |>
  select(gene_ids, ko) |>
  mutate(ko = ifelse(ko == "-", NA, ko)) |>
  drop_na(ko) |>
  separate_rows(ko, sep = ",") |>
  write_csv("../data/03_ri_annotation_augment_data.csv")
```
